description: Same moreish sausage rolls, new mouthwatering presentation. Try this tear and share sausage roll recipe at your next get-together for an easy share plate.
name: Tear & Share Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g Woolworths COOK classic beef sausage rolls with poppy seed topping
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 210°C/190°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Remove sausage rolls from packaging and cut each roll into 4 slices. Arrange slices, almost touching, in a pinwheel shape. Brush tops and sides with egg. Bake for 40 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Sprinkled with parsley and serve with tomato relish.
